title: Summer Game Fest Updates! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.02.22
description:
What is Obsidian showing? What is Ubisoft waiting for? What is Nvidia HIDING? Blessing and Tim tackle it all on a Summer Game Fest/E3 heavy episode of KFGD.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:47 - Housekeeping
A new episode of Gamescast is up right now and it’s our Summer Games Showcase Bets and Predictions. We also talk Sonic Frontiers and Pokemon impressions. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
PlayStation’s State of Play is going down later today. We are live reacting. And then immediately after we’ll be recording PS I Love You XOXO live as the post show. You won’t want to miss it so tune into that later today on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire & Fargo Brady
The Roper Report   -
00:08:47 - Obsidian seems like it’s showing something at Xbox’s Showcase - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:14:40 - Ubisoft isn’t planning to hold its own E3-style showcase in June - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:22:50 - GeForce Now Will No Longer Support God of War Starting Next Month - Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:24:30 - What is GeForce teasing? - Twitter
00:31:40 -  Ad
00:35:02 - More PC stuff: Valve Delays the Steam Deck’s Docking Station - Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:41:40 - Dragon Age 4 has an official title - Blog
00:46:14 - There is a sick Stranger Things themed Xbox - News.Xbox.com
00:47:45 - Super Nintendo World Update
00:50:25 - Out today
00:55:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
